title: Fighter flag
data:
{{stub}}

Monsters with this flag are considered to be skilled fighters. This monster flag is used to characterize monster behaviour. At the moment, the only application of this flag is when a fighter loses line of sight from a player. While normally intelligent creatures with a ranged attack will attempt to regain line of sight, fighters will not (except [[centaur warrior]]s and [[yaktaur captain]]s).

Source: http://git.develz.org/?p=crawl.git;a=blob;f=crawl-ref/source/mon-behv.cc#l81
